tool_description: Our email service API utilizes the SMTP protocol for seamless and efficient email communication.
name: SentEmail
title: SentEmail

api_list.name: Send email
api_list.description:
The body request include:
- smtp object with (host, port, user, pass)
- data object with (to, from, subject, body and attachments (links))
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentemail.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentemail.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentemail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
